content:
Absolutely! Even if you're not up for a strenuous hike, there are plenty of scenic drives in the Rutland area for you to enjoy the stunning scenery.

1. Route 100: This highway runs through the heart of Vermont and offers breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains, forests, and farmland. It's particularly beautiful during the fall foliage season.

2. Brandon Gap Road: This road offers a scenic drive through the Green Mountains with views of the surrounding valleys, forests, and mountains. 

3. Chittenden Road: This is a peaceful road that winds its way through the small town of Chittenden, offering beautiful views of the surrounding mountains and forests.

4. Route 4: This highway offers stunning views of the Green Mountains and passes through quaint Vermont towns, including Woodstock and Killington.

These scenic drives are perfect for taking in the beautiful nature and landscapes of Vermont without having to exert yourself. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the views!
